Verses.1: As He went along, He saw a man who was born blind.
Verses.2: His disciples asked Him, "Rabbi, who sinned that he was born blind? This man or his parents?"
Verses.3: Jesus answered, "Neither that man sinned, nor his parents. Instead, it was so that the works of God might be revealed in him.
Verses.4: We must do the works of the one who sent me while it is day. Night is coming, when no one can work.
Verses.5: While I am in the world, I am the Light of the world."

Changes: 2023-07-20 - Paul Prins: First translation of chapter 9:1-5.
